attributes.action: To erect a permanent public memorial for the late David Bowie
attributes.additional_details: An inspiration to thousands of Artists worldwide & hundreds of thousands across the globe with an adoring reverence.His career spanned multiple generations and as a result has touched the heart of many, in particular citizens of the UK."David Bowie is deeply imbedded in the heart of British culture, as a fixture within our collective inner psyche, influencing every decade from the moment he first appeared on the airwaves with "Space Oddity" in 1969, right up to the present day.¨ [Annie Lennox]
attributes.background: To erect a permanent memorial for the legendary David Bowie, to reflect the wishes of hundreds of thousands of people worldwide as a mark of respect and appreciation for this unique British icon.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The erection of memorials is the responsibility of the local authority or organisation upon whose land the memorial is to be erected.
